Articles.Content:
I thought this might be covered under the support section, but thought I should come here first. My question is simple - Where are the fairing parts? I'm playing on Windows, using the Steam version and I have reinstalled twice, and verified the integrity of the game 5 times now and still cannot find the fairing parts. The game is (obviously) fully stock. Any help appreciated!!

Edited April 28, 2015 by ToTheMun

They're under aerodynamic, and they are really there. Right up in the default menu near some nose-cones... first few lines. If you can't find them, they LOOK like nose-cones

They are procedural, so you only need one part.
Thank you so much!! I literally spent hours trying to find these XDD So deceitful that they made them look like nosecones...
